sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT TOP 1
RunID,PMO_Group_Id
,'EICase' + CaseNo as CaseNo
,PMO_number,SrcOrgCode,SrcOrgCodeProd,DstOrgCode,DstOrgCodeProd,SrcFacIDs
,Exclude_Admin_Notes,Exclude_Cust_UDA,Exclude_CP_Lib,Exclude_Alerts,Exclude_Inc
,Exclude_MISC,Exclude_Roles,Exclude_AR
,convert(varchar,New_AR_Start,121) as New_AR_Start
,Exclude_Trust,Exclude_GLAP,Exclude_GLAP_Bank
,Exclude_Master_Insur,Exclude_QIA,ProdRun,Completed,If_Current_Resident
,convert(varchar,Current_Resident_As_Of,121) as Current_Resident_As_Of
,'[' + SRC.ServerName + ']' AS SRC_SERVER
,'[' + SRC.ServerName + '].' + SRC.DatabaseName AS SRC_SERVER_DB
,SRC.DatabaseName AS SRC_DB
,'[' + SRCPROD.ServerName + ']' AS SRCPROD_SERVER
,'[' + SRCPROD.ServerName + '].' + SRCPROD.DatabaseName AS SRCPROD_SERVER_DB
,SRCPROD.DatabaseName AS SRCPROD_DB
,'[' + DST.ServerName + ']' AS DST_SERVER
,'[' + DST.ServerName + '].' + DST.DatabaseName AS DST_SERVER_DB
,DST.DatabaseName AS DST_DB
,'[' + DSTPROD.ServerName + ']' AS DSTPROD_SERVER
,'[' + DSTPROD.ServerName + '].' + DSTPROD.DatabaseName AS DSTPROD_SERVER_DB
,DSTPROD.DatabaseName AS DSTPROD_DB
,DSTPROD.OrgID AS DSTPROD_ORGID
,NetSuite_IDs
,ds_resource
,If_Multi_to_Single
FROM LOADDCNMASTER WITH (NOLOCK)
JOIN ds_tasks.dbo.TS_global_organization_master SRC WITH (NOLOCK) ON LOADDCNMASTER.SrcOrgCode = SRC.OrgCode AND SRC.DELETED = 'N'
JOIN ds_tasks.dbo.TS_global_organization_master SRCPROD WITH (NOLOCK) ON LOADDCNMASTER.SrcOrgCodeProd = SRCPROD.OrgCode AND SRCPROD.DELETED = 'N'
JOIN ds_tasks.dbo.TS_global_organization_master DST WITH (NOLOCK) ON LOADDCNMASTER.DstOrgCode = DST.OrgCode AND DST.DELETED = 'N'
JOIN ds_tasks.dbo.TS_global_organization_master DSTPROD WITH (NOLOCK) ON LOADDCNMASTER.DstOrgCodeProd = DSTPROD.OrgCode AND DSTPROD.DELETED = 'N'
WHERE RUNID = 155

dependsOn.activity: Bkp and Clean up temp tables

ifTrueActivities.name: PCC Connect Disable in Source Prod

text.value:
SELECT src.* INTO pcc_temp_storage.dbo._bkp_message_profile_@{activity('Single_Input').output.firstRow.CaseNo}
FROM @{activity('Single_Input').output.firstRow.SRCPROD_SERVER_DB}.dbo.message_profile src
JOIN @{activity('Single_Input').output.firstRow.SRCPROD_SERVER_DB}.dbo.lib_message_profile ON src.message_profile_id = lib_message_profile.message_profile_id
where src.fac_id IN (@{activity('Single_Input').output.firstRow.SrcFacIDs}) AND lib_message_profile.vendor_code = 'collective-postacute'


DELETE src FROM @{activity('Single_Input').output.firstRow.SRCPROD_SERVER_DB}.dbo.message_profile src
JOIN @{activity('Single_Input').output.firstRow.SRCPROD_SERVER_DB}.dbo.lib_message_profile ON src.message_profile_id = lib_message_profile.message_profile_id
where src.fac_id IN (@{activity('Single_Input').output.firstRow.SrcFacIDs}) AND lib_message_profile.vendor_code = 'collective-postacute'

activities.name: Disable Integrations in SRC If Prod Run

dependsOn.activity: Disable Integrations in SRC If Prod Run

text.value:
update dbo.CopyFac
set queryfilter = isnull(queryfilter,'') + case when queryfilter is NULL then ' (client_id in (select client_id from @{activity('Single_Input').output.firstRow.SRC_DB}.dbo.clients where fac_id in (select fac_id from facility where fac_id <> 9001) and isnull(discharge_date,getdate()) >= ''@{activity('Single_Input').output.firstRow.Current_Resident_As_Of}'' AND admission_Date is not null  and current_census_id is not null ) or client_id is NULL or client_id < 0)'
 else ' and' + ' (client_id in (select client_id from @{activity('Single_Input').output.firstRow.SRC_DB}.dbo.clients where fac_id in (select fac_id from facility where fac_id <> 9001) and isnull(discharge_date,getdate()) >= ''@{activity('Single_Input').output.firstRow.Current_Resident_As_Of}'' AND admission_Date is not null  and current_census_id is not null ) or client_id is NULL or client_id < 0)' end -- enter the list of client_id to be excluded
where tablename in (select table_name from information_schema.columns where column_name in ('client_id'))
and joins in ('0','-1','0A')
and tablename not in ('auth_remote_resource_configuration')

update dbo.CopyFac
set queryfilter = isnull(queryfilter,'') + case when queryfilter is NULL then ' (a.client_id in (select client_id from @{activity('Single_Input').output.firstRow.SRC_DB}.dbo.clients where fac_id in (select fac_id from facility where fac_id <> 9001) and isnull(discharge_date,getdate()) >= ''@{activity('Single_Input').output.firstRow.Current_Resident_As_Of}'' AND admission_Date is not null  and current_census_id is not null ) or a.client_id is NULL or a.client_id < 0)'
 else ' and' + ' (a.client_id in (select client_id from @{activity('Single_Input').output.firstRow.SRC_DB}.dbo.clients where fac_id in (select fac_id from facility where fac_id <> 9001) and isnull(discharge_date,getdate()) >= ''@{activity('Single_Input').output.firstRow.Current_Resident_As_Of}'' AND admission_Date is not null and current_census_id is not null ) or a.client_id is NULL or a.client_id < 0)' end -- enter the list of client_id to be excluded
--select * from copyfac
where tablename in (select table_name from information_schema.columns where column_name in ('client_id'))
and joins not in ('0','-1','0A')
and tablename not in ('auth_remote_resource_configuration')

update dbo.CopyFac
set queryfilter = isnull(queryfilter,'') + case when queryfilter is NULL then ' (clientid in (select client_id from @{activity('Single_Input').output.firstRow.SRC_DB}.dbo.clients where fac_id in (select fac_id from facility where fac_id <> 9001) and isnull(discharge_date,getdate()) >= ''@{activity('Single_Input').output.firstRow.Current_Resident_As_Of}'' AND admission_Date is not null  and current_census_id is not null ) or clientid is NULL or clientid < 0)'
 else ' and' + ' (clientid in (select client_id from @{activity('Single_Input').output.firstRow.SRC_DB}.dbo.clients where fac_id in (select fac_id from facility where fac_id <> 9001) and isnull(discharge_date,getdate()) >= ''@{activity('Single_Input').output.firstRow.Current_Resident_As_Of}'' AND admission_Date is not null and current_census_id is not null ) or clientid is NULL or clientid < 0)' end -- enter the list of client_id to be excluded
where tablename in (select table_name from information_schema.columns where column_name in ('clientid'))
and joins in ('0','-1')
and tablename not in ('auth_remote_resource_configuration')

update dbo.CopyFac
set queryfilter = isnull(queryfilter,'') + case when queryfilter is NULL then ' (a.clientid in (select client_id from @{activity('Single_Input').output.firstRow.SRC_DB}.dbo.clients where fac_id in (select fac_id from facility where fac_id <> 9001) and isnull(discharge_date,getdate()) >= ''@{activity('Single_Input').output.firstRow.Current_Resident_As_Of}'' AND admission_Date is not null  and current_census_id is not null ) or a.clientid is NULL or a.clientid < 0)'
 else ' and' + ' (a.clientid in (select client_id from @{activity('Single_Input').output.firstRow.SRC_DB}.dbo.clients where fac_id in (select fac_id from facility where fac_id <> 9001) and isnull(discharge_date,getdate()) >= ''@{activity('Single_Input').output.firstRow.Current_Resident_As_Of}'' AND admission_Date is not null and current_census_id is not null ) or a.clientid is NULL or a.clientid < 0)' end -- enter the list of client_id to be excluded
--select * from copyfac
where tablename in (select table_name from information_schema.columns where column_name in ('clientid'))
and joins not in ('0','-1')
and tablename not in ('auth_remote_resource_configuration')

update dbo.copyfac
set queryfilter = ' std_assess_id  in (select std_assess_id from @{activity('Single_Input').output.firstRow.SRC_DB}.dbo.as_std_assessment where system_flag = ''Y'' or std_assess_id in (
select std_assess_id from @{activity('Single_Input').output.firstRow.SRC_DB}.dbo.as_std_assessment_system_assessment_mapping) )' -- enter the list of std_assess_id to be included in the copy
where tablename in (select table_name from information_schema.columns where column_name = 'std_assess_id')
and joins in ('0','-1')

update dbo.copyfac
set queryfilter = ' a.std_assess_id  in (select std_assess_id from @{activity('Single_Input').output.firstRow.SRC_DB}.dbo.as_std_assessment where system_flag = ''Y'' or std_assess_id in (
select std_assess_id from @{activity('Single_Input').output.firstRow.SRC_DB}.dbo.as_std_assessment_system_assessment_mapping) )' -- enter the list of std_assess_id to be included in the copy
--select * from copyfac
where tablename in (select table_name from information_schema.columns where column_name = 'std_assess_id')
and joins not in ('0','-1')

IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#tempartabletoexclude') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #tempartabletoexclude

select tablename into #tempartabletoexclude
from copyfac where tablename in
('ar_transactions_payment','ar_transaction_recurring_tx_refs','ar_unapplied_cash','ar_batch_poc_info','ar_transactions_contact_cash'
,'ar_sbb_client_service_package_detail','ar_aging_snapshot','ar_claim_cob_amt','ar_claim_cob_cas','ar_claim_cob_payer','ar_invoice_claim','ar_invoice_transaction'
,'ar_invoice_statement','ar_claim_cob_nte','ar_claim_additional_payer_info','ar_invoice','ar_invoice_batch','ar_applied_payment_history','ar_mppr_bumpup'
,'ar_transaction_admin_fee_xrefs','ar_transactions','ar_transactions_rollup_client','edi_import_detail_message','edi_import_detail','ar_batch'
,'edi_import','ar_collections_letter_generation','ar_collection_call','work_activity','ar_admission_charge_recurring_transaction','ar_recurring_transactions'
,'ar_client_income','AR_THERAPY_PREVIOUS_AMOUNTS','ar_aging_check_summary','cash_receipt_check_summary','current_day_check_summary','current_revenue_check_summary'
,'data_integrity_check_summary','past_day_check_summary','past_revenue_check_summary'
,'ar_dso_client_balance','ar_batch_errors','ar_collection_call_txs','ar_import_835_result','ar_import_835_txn_result','ar_invoice_link')

delete 
--select *
from copyfac where tablename in
(select tablename from #tempartabletoexclude)

delete 
--select *
from copyfacjoin where tablename in
(select tablename from #tempartabletoexclude)

delete 
--select *
from copyfacjoin where parenttable in
(select tablename from #tempartabletoexclude)

IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#temptatabletoexclude') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #temptatabletoexclude

select tablename into #temptatabletoexclude
from copyfac where tablename in
('ta_transaction','ta_batch','ta_statement','ta_client_account','ta_client_income_source','ta_configuration_audit','ta_vendor')


delete 
--select *
from copyfac where tablename in
(select tablename from #temptatabletoexclude)

delete 
--select *
from copyfacjoin where tablename in
(select tablename from #temptatabletoexclude)

delete 
--select *
from copyfacjoin where parenttable in
(select tablename from #temptatabletoexclude)

IF OBJECT_ID('_CopyTable') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE _CopyTable

SELECT * INTO _CopyTable from @{activity('Single_Input').output.firstRow.DST_DB}.dbo._CopyTable

exec sproc_core_refresh_cached_org_record 

SET IDENTITY_INSERT scrm_dashboard ON
insert into scrm_dashboard (dashboard_id,user_id,system,name,created_by,created_date,revision_by,revision_date)
select * from @{activity('Single_Input').output.firstRow.SRC_DB}.dbo.scrm_dashboard src
where src.user_id is NULL
and not exists (select 1 from scrm_dashboard where src.dashboard_id = dashboard_id)
SET IDENTITY_INSERT scrm_dashboard OFF

insert into scrm_dashboard_tile
select * from @{activity('Single_Input').output.firstRow.SRC_DB}.dbo.scrm_dashboard_tile src
where src.dashboard_id in (select dashboard_id from @{activity('Single_Input').output.firstRow.SRC_DB}.dbo.scrm_dashboard where user_id is NULL)
and not exists (select 1 from scrm_dashboard_tile where src.dashboard_id = dashboard_id)
select 1 from facility with (nolock)

update branded
set value = 'N', enabled_by = NULL, enabled_date = NULL, disabled_by = '@{activity('Single_Input').output.firstRow.CaseNo}', disabled_date = getdate()
FROM branded_library_configuration partner
JOIN branded_library_feature_configuration branded ON branded.brand_id = partner.brand_id
where partner.brand_name = 'Connected Care Center by PointClickCare' 
and branded.value = 'Y'

update facility
set location_status_id = 3
--select *
from facility 
where location_status_id = 4

insert into sec_user
select * from pcc_temp_storage.dbo._bkp_E026477_new_sec_user

insert into sec_user_role
select * from pcc_temp_storage.dbo._bkp_E026477_new_sec_user_role

activities.name: Bkp and Clean up temp tables

text.value:
DECLARE @ID INT
DECLARE @TableName varchar(500)
DECLARE @rowcount int
DECLARE @SQL varchar(max)
DECLARE @casenumber varchar(100)
DECLARE @log_db varchar(100) = 'pcc_temp_storage'


SET @casenumber = '@{activity('Single_Input').output.firstRow.CaseNo}'


DECLARE MyCursor CURSOR FOR
	select  name
	from sys.objects where type = 'U' and name in ('_TrimFK','_TrimTriggers','_TrimViews','_TrimTable','_CopyTable','CopyFac','CopyFacJoin','_OtherFac_id_table','_copyfacconditions')
OPEN MyCursor
FETCH NEXT FROM MyCursor INTO @TableName
WHILE @@Fetch_Status =0
BEGIN
		
		IF OBJECT_ID(@log_db + '.dbo.' + @casenumber + @TableName, 'U') IS NOT NULL EXEC ('DROP TABLE ' + @log_db + '.dbo.' + @casenumber + @TableName)
		
		SET @SQL = 'select * into ' + @log_db + '.dbo.' + @casenumber + @TableName + ' from dbo.' + @TableName
		PRINT @SQL
		EXEC (@SQL)

		SET @SQL = 'drop table dbo.' + @TableName
		PRINT @SQL
		EXEC (@SQL)
		
	FETCH NEXT FROM MyCursor INTO @TableName
	END
CLOSE MyCursor
DEALLOCATE MyCursor

DROP PROCEDURE IF EXISTS [operational].[sproc_prepare_copy_tables]

DROP PROCEDURE IF EXISTS [operational].[sproc_copy_data1_facid_and_nojoin]

DROP PROCEDURE IF EXISTS [operational].[sproc_copy_data2_joins]

drop table if exists _copy_as_response
drop table if exists _copy_pho_schedule_details
